noise_solver_parameters.comment:
This file is a description of 2MRT model helicopter rotor at NASA Langley Research Center.
The data source is NASA Technical Memorandum 100541, Inflow Measurement Made with a Laser Velocimeter on a Helicopter Model in Forward Flight( Volume 1, Rectangular Planform Blades at an Advance Ratio of 0.15), April 1988.
The four-bladed rotor hub is fully articulated with viscous dampers for lead-lag motion and coincident flap and lag hinges.
Compiled by Shuai Deng, Tsinghua University, 2014/7/21
时间采样数目:要求是2的方幂
展向分段类型：1.均布（default） 0.非均布
noise_solver_parameters.EQRGRID:
1< /EQRGRID> 展向分段参数1：桨根间距（若为均布，赋0） 0 展向分段参数2：桨尖间距 0.025
弦向分段数目 50 弦向分段类型：1.均布（default） 0.非均布 0 < /EQCGRID> 弦向分段参数1：翼型前缘间距 0.001 弦向分段参数2：翼型后缘间距 0
输入数据的时间步长数目 36 输出时间周期数目 1
